dct_title_s: Map of the state of Montana
dct_description_sm: Compiled by R.H. Morton.; Revised and lettered by I.F. Berthrong.; S Doc 194 59 2.; Andrew B. Graham Co., photo-lithographers, Washington, D.C.; Shows Indian reservations, military reservations, and townships containing coal.
